Throwback to some #AMAs memories! We love the @AMAs because they’re all about the FANS. Can’t wait to watch the show, TONIGHT at 8/7c on ABC! https://t.co/I490iIDBNR

KNOW YOUR RIGHTS! 866-OurVote is here to help you TODAY. Your vote matters and deserves to be counted! If you have questions OR need to report any issues at the polls, call one of these numbers 866-Our-Vote has provided #electionprotection #CountEveryVote #VOTE https://t.co/g1nGsEuqGl

Released today on 7” vinyl in celebration of Record Store Day 2020 - The “Memories / Memories (Dillon Francis Remix)” 7” and 20 page photo & lyric booklet • Limited to 3500 copies • Find a participating store near you at https://t.co/gjQRwylTre @recordstoreday #RSD20 #RSDDrops https://t.co/1z3SPHpNB6
“Nobody’s Love Remix (Ft. Popcaan)” Out Now #NobodysLove https://t.co/BnMI5Tqhfb https://t.co/lhZkiXwP2A

The climate crisis is one of the biggest threats to our homes, our families, and our futures. This year, we all have to vote and take it seriously. #Vote2020 #ActOnClimate #PeoplePlanetPower https://t.co/OOz70eFWEc

Photo by IG @bootswallace • 2019 Climate March • Los Angeles https://t.co/iBLZCQSdtk

The most important thing you can do today is ensure you’re registered to vote in the upcoming election. Click the link below to register to vote or check your status
#NationalVoterRegistrationDay
https://t.co/7Schd9n3UV https://t.co/4HpYpJ5UJM
Join Jesse Carmichael today for a special event talking about youth power in the upcoming election and how youth can fight for their future. https://t.co/DpiiwkfcNz https://t.co/PfDUMyLZbU

What did @Prince think of @AdamLevine’s 2014 cover of #PurpleRain? The @Maroon5 frontman reveals to @HowardStern what his Royal Badness said about the performance.

Find the full interview on @SiriusXM: https://t.co/szRajHcBP6 https://t.co/AgdcPVVJ5u
Tomorrow morning on @sternshow catch Adam’s chat with Howard and a special performance of “Nobody’s Love” • 8:30 AM EST • @SIRIUSXM CHANNEL 100 https://t.co/GCdmsi8aM3

NYC! Tickets for our show at Madison Square Garden on July 10th, 2021 are on sale today! We can’t wait to be back in your amazing city. #M5TOUR2021 Tickets at: https://t.co/kLEG1EzyXH https://t.co/0RJ9op4k3H

Our latest single "Nobody's Love" is out now everywhere!
Stream here: https://t.co/v8MhlUTY1V
#NobodysLove https://t.co/rVMVZDifKg

"Nobody’s Love" • 7.23 • 9PM PST

We can’t wait to get back on the road! Where will you be seeing us? Get your tickets now to join us for an incredible show. 🤘🏼 #M5TOUR2021 https://t.co/kLEG1EzyXH https://t.co/CFxAyjaxH9

For anyone who already had tickets to the canceled CITI Field show, you will receive an email from Live Nation for details and special pre-sale information. Head to https://t.co/kLEG1EzyXH for more details. #M5TOUR2021

ANNOUNCEMENT: We’ve rescheduled the US 2020 tour dates and are looking forward to being back on tour with you next year! Tickets are available NOW, with the exception of the NEW Madison Square Garden show on September 10, 2021 which goes on sale Friday, July 24. https://t.co/GQNZoNdDeb
